questions.question: Karl Marx believes that history can be viewed as a...

choices.answer: bring modern technology to Russian farms

choices.answer: survival of the fittest and natural selection
separation of powers and checks and balances

One of the major causes of the Russian Revolution of 1917 was the

choices.answer: abuse of political power by Czar Nicholas II
government's refusal to enter World War I
rapid expansion of the right to vote

questions.question: A major goal of Joseph Stalin's five-year plans was to

choices.answer: encourage communist revolutions in the colonies
transform the Soviet Union into an industrial power
expand the Soviet Union's borders to include water ports
reduce the amount of foreign aid coming from the West

choices.answer: The nation adopted a constitutional monarchy
Trotsky and his followers assumed full control of the govt

choices.answer: Free enterprise replaced a command economy
Ownership of farms was returned to individual farmers

questions.question: Which situation is characteristic of totalitarianism?

choices.answer: Artists and musicians experience artistic freedom
The freedom of speech, press, and religion are denied
Judges and the courts are independent of government control

choices.answer: No markets existed for artistic or literary works
